Key ResponsibilitiesRecruit, lead, and mentor a data science team focused on deploying value-adding machine learning modelsCollaborate with business, technology, and operations teams to make a significant, measurable impact across the companyBuild and maintain robust, scalable, and maintainable machine learning solutionsRequired Qualifications and EducationMinimum of 4 years of experience in building machine learning models, with multiple models deployed to productionExperience in forming partnerships with and influencing cross-functional leadersExperience in developing machine learning models in an exploratory data analytics environment and transitioning them to productionProficiency in machine learning tools such as Python, TensorFlow, Keras, pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, spark, scala, hive, impalaBA / BS in Computer Science, Math, Physics, Engineering, Statistics, or other technical fields, with a preference for a MA / MS
